name: Spaghetti Carbonara
ingredients: chicken, olive oil, milk, tofu, salt
steps: To prepare Spaghetti Carbonara, start by gathering all the ingredients: chicken, olive oil, milk, tofu, salt. Heat a pan over medium heat and add olive oil.
